item.title: A very brief history of abstraction
item.description: Hi computers, I have been thinking about abstraction and I would like to share my thoughts with you. Let‚Äôs first of all define what I understand about abstraction, in computer science terms. First definition: An abstract definition of something is something that is as undefined as possible but can potentially be infinitely defined. A less abstract version of First definition: An abstract definition of something (x|object) is something (x|object) that is as undefined as possible (according to the current base knowledge) but can potentially be infinitely defined.
